name: Rhythm Shapes (KeychainStudios)
description:
A new rhythm game (currently in development),

  1. Select a song
  2. Press the Play Button
  3. Listen to the beats and wait for the right moment using left and right arrows (Web), or tapping your mobile screen on the left or right side.
  4. Fill the circles with rhythm, if you fill them you win.

Comment if you like it and tell me what could make it a better game, and if you didn't like it your feedback is very welcome to improve the game.

Post your best scores :)

Songs used for this game:

Shiro (Kirkoid Mix) by Kirkoid (c) copyright 2013 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Kirkoid/43938

Urbana-Metronica (wooh-yeah mix) by spinningmerkaba (c) copyright 2011 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/jlbrock44/33345 Ft: Morusque, Jeris, CSoul, Alex Beroza

Guitalele's Happy Place by Stefan Kartenberg (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/JeffSpeed68/56194 Ft: Kara Square (mindmapthat)
